title: Life Coach for Overthinking – SEO-Optimized Draft Website (Bangalore)

requirements.summary: Create a full single-page React website with Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, and Contact/CTA sections, styled with clean, warm, professional design inspired by coachshannonbeer.com, targeting mid-career professionals in Bangalore
acceptanceCriteria: All six sections (Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, Contact/CTA) are visible and scroll correctly on a single page
Layout and tone mirror the calm, professional, conversion-focused style of coachshannonbeer.com
Content explicitly calls out Bangalore location and mid-career professional audience
Site is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop

file_operations.description: Transform App.tsx into a single-page layout with all six sections: Hero, About, Services, Testimonials, FAQ, and Contact/CTA. Structure the layout with ample whitespace and a calm, professional tone. Ensure the page is fully responsive and scrollable.

Create Hero section component with bold headline, subheadline, saffron CTA button, and background using the generated image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png. Include trust indicator mentioning Bangalore.

Create About section component with professional photo placeholder using frontend/public/assets/generated/coach-placeholder.dim_400x400.png, personal story narrative, credentials highlights, and secondary saffron CTA. Use warm, human tone building trust with mid-career professionals.

Create Services section component showcasing 3 coaching offerings with service cards. Each card includes icon from frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icons.dim_512x512.png, title, description, and saffron 'Learn More' button. Use subtle blue-to-indigo gradient as section background.

Create Testimonials section component with 3 client testimonial cards in a responsive grid or carousel. Each card includes name, role/industry, quote about overcoming overthinking, and star rating. Add subtle green-to-indigo gradient accent.

Create FAQ section component with accessible accordion for at least 5 common questions about overthinking life coaching. Include questions relevant to mid-career professionals and Bangalore context. Use shadcn/ui Accordion component for accessibility.

Create Contact/CTA section component with prominent headline, saffron 'Book a Free Discovery Call' button, and contact form with Name, Email, Phone (optional), and Message fields with basic validation. Display Bangalore location and show success message on form submission (frontend-only, no backend).

requirements.summary: Apply cohesive visual theme with saffron primary color for CTAs, subtle blue-to-indigo or green-to-indigo gradients sparingly, warm off-white/cream backgrounds, dark charcoal text, and elegant typography
acceptanceCriteria: All primary CTA buttons use saffron color with appropriate hover state
Blue/green/indigo gradients appear in no more than 2–3 sections, used as backgrounds or decorative accents
No blue or purple used as dominant theme colors
Consistent typography with distinct heading and body styles throughout

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind config with custom saffron color (#F4A724), warm off-white/cream background colors, dark charcoal text colors, and gradient definitions for blue-to-indigo and green-to-indigo. Configure serif font for headings and clean sans-serif for body.

Define global CSS custom properties for saffron primary color, warm backgrounds, charcoal text, and gradient utilities. Import and configure serif and sans-serif font families. Set base typography styles for headings and body text with proper hierarchy.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section is full-viewport height on desktop

Saffron CTA button is prominently displayed

acceptanceCriteria: About section contains a photo placeholder, bio text, and highlighted credentials or methodology points

requirements.summary: Implement full on-page SEO optimization with keyword-rich meta tags, Open Graph tags, semantic HTML5, proper heading hierarchy, JSON-LD LocalBusiness structured data, image alt attributes, and canonical link
acceptanceCriteria: <title> and <meta description> are keyword-rich and relevant to overthinking life coaching in Bangalore
Open Graph tags are present in the <head>
Page uses semantic HTML5 landmarks throughout
Heading hierarchy is correct: one H1, multiple H2s, H3s as needed
JSON-LD LocalBusiness structured data block is present in the <head>
All images have non-empty alt attributes
A canonical <link> tag is present

file_operations.description: Add comprehensive SEO meta tags to <head>: keyword-rich <title> (e.g., 'Life Coach for Overthinking | Bangalore | Mid-Career Professionals'), compelling <meta name='description'>, Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:type, og:image), canonical <link> tag, and JSON-LD structured data for LocalBusiness schema with Bangalore address and coaching service type.

Ensure App.tsx uses proper semantic HTML5 elements: <header> for navbar, <main> for main content, <section> for each major section with appropriate ARIA labels, and <footer> for footer. Verify single <h1> in Hero, <h2> for section headings, and <h3> for sub-items. Ensure all images have descriptive alt attributes.
Ensure Hero section uses a single <h1> element for the main headline and includes descriptive alt attribute for the hero background image.
Ensure About section uses <h2> for section heading and includes descriptive alt attribute for the coach photo placeholder image frontend/public/assets/generated/coach-placeholder.dim_400x400.png.

Ensure Services section uses <h2> for section heading, <h3> for service card titles, and includes descriptive alt attributes for all service icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/service-icons.dim_512x512.png.
Ensure Testimonials section uses <h2> for section heading and <h3> for testimonial names if structured as headings.
Ensure FAQ section uses <h2> for section heading and proper semantic structure within the accordion.
Ensure Contact section uses <h2> for section heading and proper form labels for accessibility.

Implement responsive design with hamburger menu for mobile that toggles navigation links. Use shadcn/ui components for mobile menu if appropriate. Wire Navbar component into the App layout at the top, ensuring it is fixed/sticky on scroll and all section links target the correct section IDs for smooth scrolling.

Wire Footer component into the App layout at the bottom, after the Contact section.
